mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Founded in 1881, it was the first institution of higher learning in the Dakota Territory. Yankton College closed in December 1984, and its campus became the site of Federal Prison Camp, Yankton which opened four years later. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yankton_College Originally a disused airplane hangar, moved and reconstructed at the college, Spring 1947 -- Grow and Varvel, Yankton, South Dakota in Vintage Postcards, 2004 [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
